Minecraft Merch at Target我的世界 TARGET商店里的商品


Tons of new merch now available at Target stores!                    Target商店最近上架了大量的新商品！
                




444.jpg (219.62 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-13 17:50 上传






Do you live in America? Do you love Minecraft (hopefully, or you're on the wrong site)? Would you like over 75 new pieces of Minecraft merchandise to be available at Target stores across the U.S, along with 80 only-at-Target finds? Including exclusive MINECON Earth merchandise?你住在美国吗？你喜欢MC吗?（希望你喜欢，不然就是你走错网站了？）你希望全美国的Target商店上架超过75件关于MC的商品，还有80件Target独家商品和MINECON Earth（MC的年度全球庆典）的限量商品吗？





333.jpg (191.95 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-13 17:50 上传





Well you're in luck! Because your incredibly-specific dream is about to come true – Target now offer tons of great new Minecraft merchandise, including apparel, toys and home decoration! In theory, you could be wearing Minecraft while playing Minecraft, inside your Minecraft-themed house. That sounds like the right amount of Minecraft!好吧，你走大运了！因为你梦寐以求的事情即将实现——Target商店现在提供了大量的MC商品供你挑选，其中包括服装，玩具甚至是家居装饰品！理论上来说，如果你在玩MC的时候穿着MC的衣服，住在MC主题的屋子里，这听起来是最适合MC的！





222.jpg (206.57 KB, 下载次数: 0)

We've included some screenshots of the new loot in this article, but why not click here and have a browse on the Target website?我们在这篇文章里放了一些新商品的图片，但是你为什么不点一下这里，然后在Target网站上浏览一下呢？
